Class AbstractCacheListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.paralleluniverse.galaxy.AbstractCacheListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheListener

    public abstract class AbstractCacheListener
extends Object
implements CacheListener
    An empty (no-op) implementation of CacheListener.

      • received

        public void received(Cache cache,
            long id,
            long version,
            ByteBuffer data)
        Description copied from interface: CacheListener
        The data item has been updated by another node. This is the opposite of the invalidated event. This method is not called when the item is modified locally by a set().
        Specified by:
        received in interface CacheListener
        id - The item's ID.
        version - The item's version.
        data - The item's contents.

      • evicted

        public void evicted(Cache cache,
           long id)
        Description copied from interface: CacheListener
        The data item has been evicted from the local cache. Only items not owned by the local node can be evicted.
        Specified by:

        id - The item's ID.
